Package org.cibseven.bpm.engine.impl.db

Interface HasDbRevision

All Known Implementing Classes:
AcquirableJobEntity, AttachmentEntity, AuthorizationEntity, BatchEntity, BatchStatisticsEntity, ByteArrayEntity, CamundaFormDefinitionEntity, CaseDefinitionEntity, CaseExecutionEntity, CaseSentryPartEntity, CommentEntity, DecisionDefinitionEntity, DecisionRequirementsDefinitionEntity, EventSubscriptionEntity, EverLivingJobEntity, ExecutionEntity, ExternalTaskEntity, FilterEntity, GroupEntity, HistoricVariableInstanceEntity, IdentityInfoEntity, IncidentEntity, JobDefinitionEntity, JobEntity, LdapGroupEntity, LdapUserEntity, MessageEntity, ProcessDefinitionEntity, ProcessDefinitionStatisticsEntity, PropertyEntity, TaskEntity, TenantEntity, TimerEntity, UserEntity, VariableInstanceEntity
public interface HasDbRevision
Entities that are using revisions for optimistic locking, need to implement this interface.
Author:
Joram Barrez
